entities.description: A large, black, curved ultrawide computer monitor mounted on a desk arm, displaying lines of code.
A mechanical keyboard with a white base, multicolored keycaps (white, grey, orange/brown), and turquoise backlighting on some keys.
A long, padded black wrist rest placed in front of the keyboard.
A black computer mouse with a glowing light that changes from blue to red.
A large desk mat with a grey and blue graphic depicting a mountain or forest silhouette.
Two water bottles on the desk, one is black and one is blue.
Multiple white, paneled interior doors with silver or brushed nickel doorknobs are seen throughout the house.
Various black-framed pictures hanging on the walls, notably a long panoramic photo in the first room and a collection of family photos on the staircase wall.
A carpeted staircase with light beige carpeting, leading from the first floor to the second.
A staircase and second-floor balcony railing with white spindles and a contrasting dark brown wood handrail.
Several square windows with white frames and grids, located high on the walls in the stairwell and main living area.
A light brown or tan fabric sofa with decorative pillows.
A large, colorful square textile wall hanging with a mandala-like pattern in red, blue, and gold tones.
A dark metal chandelier with multiple candle-style lights hanging from the high ceiling in the formal living room.
A set of indoor wicker-style furniture, including a loveseat and armchair, with white cushions and black-and-white patterned throw pillows.
A dark rectangular coffee table with a glass top.
A white piano lesson book titled 'PIANO Adventures' is picked up from the coffee table and carried through the house.
A dining table covered with a blue and white checkered tablecloth.
A dark-colored, five-blade ceiling fan spinning in the family room area.
Light oak or maple kitchen cabinets with dark hardware.
A stainless steel French door refrigerator covered in numerous magnets and photos.
A person wearing a purple long-sleeved shirt is seen standing at the kitchen island.
A black digital piano on a stand with a matching bench, situated under the staircase.
A white front door with a black electronic keypad lock.
A black and white racing-style gaming chair is seen in one of the upstairs bedrooms.
A bed with a dark headboard and a solid red comforter.
